page.title: 15A FOREST WORKER OF EDGEWORTH
page.content: THE FOREST WORKER The{forest worker}lives in Edgeworth and has been employed in the local woods for 11 years . He works{200 {acres of woodland}a mile from where he lives ,and finds his job enjoyable because it is outdoors and there is plenty of wildlife. Some animals like {grey squirrels,red deer and rabbits damage the trees. He plants a variety of trees mostly {Norway spruce, Scots, Corsican Pine and{Western Red Cedar.Hard woods {planted are beech ,oak and sycamore. Different jobs are done at different times of the year .In the spring he plants,clears land and repairs fencing. In the summer mows and weeds while the autumn sees tree felling and hauling. In bad winter weather he pickles wood in creosote before it is sold as fence timber.
